sp.speaker: *paidagwgo/s
sp.p:
w)= tou= strathgh/santos e)n *troi/a| pote\
*)agame/mnonos pai=, nu=n e)kei=n' e)/cesti/ soi
paro/nti leu/ssein, w(=n pro/qumos h)=sq' a)ei/.
to\ ga\r palaio\n *)/argos ou(po/qeis to/de,
th=s oi)stroplh=gos a)/lsos *)ina/xou ko/rhs:
au(/th d', *)ore/sta, tou= lukokto/nou qeou=
a)gora\ *lu/keios: ou(c a)ristera=s d' o(/de
*(/hras o( kleino\s nao/s: oi(= d' i(ka/nomen,
fa/skein *mukh/nas ta\s poluxru/sous o(ra=n
polu/fqoro/n te dw=ma *pelopidw=n to/de,
o(/qen se patro\s e)k fonw=n e)gw/ pote
pro\s sh=s o(mai/mou kai\ kasignh/ths labw\n
h)/negka ka)ce/swsa ka)ceqreya/mhn
toso/nd' e)s h(/bhs, patri\ timwro\n fo/nou.
nu=n ou)=n, *)ore/sta kai\ su\ fi/ltate ce/nwn
*pula/dh, ti/ xrh\ dra=n e)n ta/xei bouleute/on:
w(s h(mi\n h)/dh lampro\n h(li/ou se/las
e(w=|a kinei= fqe/gmat' o)rni/qwn safh=
me/laina/ t' a)/strwn e)kle/loipen eu)fro/nh.
pri\n ou)=n tin' a)ndrw=n e)codoiporei=n ste/ghs,
cuna/pteton lo/goisin: w(s e)ntau=q' e)me/n,
i(/n' ou)ke/t' o)knei=n kairo/s, a)ll' e)/rgwn a)kmh/.

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.p:
w)= fi/ltat' a)ndrw=n prospo/lwn, w(/s moi safh=
shmei=a fai/neis e)sqlo\s ei)s h(ma=s gegw/s.
w(/sper ga\r i(/ppos eu)genh/s, ka)\n h)=| ge/rwn,
e)n toi=si deinoi=s qumo\n ou)k a)pw/lesen,
a)ll' o)rqo\n ou)=s i(/sthsin, w(sau/tws de\ su\
h(ma=s t' o)tru/neis kau)to\s e)n prw/tois e(/pei.
toiga\r ta\ me\n do/canta dhlw/sw, su\ de\
o)cei=an a)koh\n toi=s e)moi=s lo/gois didou/s,
ei) mh/ ti kairou= tugxa/nw, meqa/rmoson.
e)gw\ ga\r h(ni/x' i(ko/mhn to\ *puqiko\n
mantei=on, w(s ma/qoim' o(/tw| tro/pw| patri\
di/kas a)roi/mhn tw=n foneusa/ntwn pa/ra,
xrh=| moi toiau=q' o( *foi=bos w(=n peu/sei ta/xa:
a)/skeuon au)to\n a)spi/dwn te kai\ stratou=
do/loisi kle/yai xeiro\s e)ndi/kous sfaga/s.
o(/t' ou)=n toio/nde xrhsmo\n ei)shkou/samen,
su\ me\n molw/n, o(/tan se kairo\s ei)sa/gh|,
do/mwn e)/sw tw=nd', i)/sqi pa=n to\ drw/menon,
o(/pws a)\n ei)dw\s h(mi\n a)ggei/lh|s safh=.
ou) ga/r se mh\ gh/ra| te kai\ xro/nw| makrw=|
gnw=s', ou)d' u(popteu/sousin w(=d' h)nqisme/non.
lo/gw| de\ xrw= toiw=|d', o(/ti ce/nos me\n ei)=
*fwke/ws par' a)ndro\s *fanote/ws h(/kwn: o(\ ga\r
me/gistos au)toi=s tugxa/nei doruce/nwn.
a)/ggelle d' o(/rkon prostiqei\s o(qou/neka
te/qnhk' *)ore/sths e)c a)nagkai/as tu/xhs,
a)/qloisi *puqikoi=sin e)k troxhla/twn
di/frwn kulisqei/s: w(=d' o( mu=qos e(sta/tw.
h(mei=s de\ patro\s tu/mbon, w(s e)fi/eto,
loibai=si prw=ton kai\ karato/mois xlidai=s
ste/yantes ei)=t' a)/yorron h(/comen pa/lin,
tu/pwma xalko/pleuron h)rme/noi xeroi=n,
o(\ kai\ su\ qa/mnois oi)=sqa/ pou kekrumme/non,
o(/pws lo/gw| kle/ptontes h(dei=an fa/tin
fe/rwmen au)toi=s, tou)mo\n w(s e)/rrei de/mas
flogisto\n h)/dh kai\ kathnqrakwme/non.
ti/ ga/r me lupei= tou=q', o(/tan lo/gw| qanw\n
e)/rgoisi swqw= ka)cene/gkwmai kle/os;
dokw= me/n, ou)de\n r(h=ma su\n ke/rdei kako/n.
h)/dh ga\r ei)=don polla/kis kai\ tou\s sofou\s
lo/gw| ma/thn qnh/|skontas: ei)=q', o(/tan do/mous
e)/lqwsin au)=qis, e)kteti/mhntai ple/on:
w(s ka)/m' e)pauxw= th=sde th=s fh/mhs a)/po
dedorko/t' e)xqroi=s a)/stron w(\s la/myein e)/ti.
a)ll', w)= patrw/|a gh= qeoi/ t' e)gxw/rioi,
de/casqe/ m' eu)tuxou=nta tai=sde tai=s o(doi=s,
su/ t', w)= patrw=|on dw=ma: sou= ga\r e)/rxomai
di/kh| kaqarth\s pro\s qew=n w(rmhme/nos:
kai\ mh/ m' a)/timon th=sd' a)postei/lhte gh=s,
a)ll' a)rxe/plouton kai\ katasta/thn do/mwn.
ei)/rhka me/n nun tau=ta: soi\ d' h)/dh, ge/ron,
to\ so\n mele/sqw ba/nti frourh=sai xre/os.
nw\ d' e)/cimen: kairo\s ga/r, o(/sper a)ndra/sin
me/gistos e)/rgou panto/s e)st' e)pista/ths.

sp.p:

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
sp.p:
w)= fa/os a(gno\n
kai\ gh=s i)so/moir' a)h/r, w(/s moi
polla\s me\n qrh/nwn w)|da/s,
polla\s d' a)nth/reis h)/|sqou
ste/rnwn plhga\s ai(massome/nwn,
o(po/tan dnofera\ nu\c u(poleifqh=|:
ta\ de\ pannuxi/dwn h)/dh stugerai\
cuni/sas' eu)nai\ mogerw=n oi)/kwn,
o(/sa to\n du/sthnon e)mo\n qrhnw=
pate/r', o(\n kata\ me\n ba/rbaron ai)=an
foi/nios *)/arhs ou)k e)ce/nisen,
mh/thr d' h(mh\ xw) koinolexh\s
*ai)/gisqos o(/pws dru=n u(loto/moi
sxi/zousi ka/ra foni/w| pele/kei,
kou)dei\s tou/twn oi)=ktos a)p' a)/llhs
h)\ 'mou= fe/retai, sou=, pa/ter, ou(/tws
ai)kw=s oi)ktrw=s te qano/ntos.
a)ll' ou) me\n dh\
lh/cw qrh/nwn stugerw=n te go/wn,
e)/st' a)\n pamfeggei=s a)/strwn

mh\ ou) teknole/teir' w(/s tis a)hdw\n
e)pi\ kwkutw=| tw=nde patrw/|wn
pro\ qurw=n h)xw\ pa=si profwnei=n.
w)= dw=m' *)ai/+dou kai\ *persefo/nhs,
w)= xqo/ni' *(ermh= kai\ po/tni' *)ara\
semnai/ te qew=n pai=des *)erinu/es,
ai(\ tou\s a)di/kws qnh/|skontas o(ra=q',
ai(\ tou\s eu)na\s u(pokleptome/nous,
e)/lqet', a)rh/cate, ti/sasqe patro\s
fo/non h(mete/rou,
kai/ moi to\n e)mo\n pe/myat' a)delfo/n:
mou/nh ga\r a)/gein ou)ke/ti swkw=

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
w)= pai=, pai= dustanota/tas
*)hle/ktra matro/s, ti/n' a)ei\

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
sp.p:
w)= gene/qla gennai/wn,
h(/ket' e)mw=n kama/twn paramu/qion.
oi)=da/ te kai\ cuni/hmi ta/d', ou)/ ti/ me

sp.p:
a)ll' ou)/toi to/n g' e)c *)ai/+da

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
sp.p:
nh/pios o(\s tw=n oi)ktrw=s
oi)xome/nwn gone/wn e)pila/qetai.

a(\ *)/itun, ai)e\n *)/itun o)lofu/retai,

i)w\ pantla/mwn *nio/ba, se\ d' e)/gwge ne/mw qeo/n,

ai)ei\ dakru/eis.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
ou)/toi soi\ mou/na|, te/knon,
a)/xos e)fa/nh brotw=n,

oi(=s o(mo/qen ei)= kai\ gona=| cu/naimos,
oi(/a *xruso/qemis zw/ei kai\ *)ifia/nassa,
krupta=| t' a)xe/wn e)n h(/ba|,
o)/lbios, o(\n a( kleina\

sp.p:
o(/n g' e)gw\ a)ka/mata prosme/nous', a)/teknos,

oi)=ton e)/xousa kakw=n: o( de\ la/qetai

a)ei\ me\n ga\r poqei=,

do/los h)=n o( fra/sas, e)/ros o( ktei/nas,

e)/kpagl' a)/xqh,
tou\s e)mo\s i)/de path\r

sp.speaker: *xoro/s

e)mpi/pteis ou(/tws ai)kw=s;
polu\ ga/r ti kakw=n u(perekth/sw,

e)n toi=s e)mauth=s toi=s foneu=si tou= patro\s

fwnou=sa toia/d' e)coneidi/zei kaka/:

ei)/t' ou)=n dikai/ws ei)/te mh/; le/cw de/ soi

e)rou= de\ th\n kunago\n *)/artemin, ti/nos

pai/zwn kat' a)/lsos e)ceki/nhsen podoi=n

ka)k tou=de mhni/sasa *lhtw/|a ko/rh
katei=x' *)axaiou/s, w(s path\r a)nti/staqmon
tou= qhro\s e)kqu/seie th\n au(tou= ko/rhn.
w(=d' h)=n ta\ kei/nhs qu/mat': ou) ga\r h)=n lu/sis
a)/llh stratw=| pro\s oi)=kon ou)d' ei)s *)/ilion.
a)nq' w(=n, biasqei\s polla\ ka)ntiba/s, mo/lis
e)/qusen au)th/n, ou)xi\ *mene/lew xa/rin.
ei) d' ou)=n, e)rw= ga\r kai\ to\ so/n, kei=non qe/lwn
e)pwfelh=sai tau=t' e)/dra, tou/tou qanei=n

ei) ga\r ktenou=men a)/llon a)nt' a)/llou, su/ toi

a)ll' ei)so/ra mh\ skh=yin ou)k ou)=san ti/qhs.

ai)/sxista pa/ntwn e)/rga drw=sa tugxa/neis,

ka)c eu)sebw=n blasto/ntas e)kbalou=s' e)/xeis.

kakostomou=men. kai/ s' e)/gwge despo/tin

e)ph|tia/sw: kai\ to/d', ei)/per e)/sqenon,

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:

sp.p:

e)/cwra pra/ssw kou)k e)moi\ proseiko/ta.
a)ll' h( ga\r e)k sou= dusme/neia kai\ ta\ sa\
e)/rg' e)canagka/zei me tau=ta dra=n bi/a|:
ai)sxroi=s ga\r ai)sxra\ pra/gmat' e)kdida/sketai.

sp.p:

sp.p:

tou)/rgon: ta\ d' e)/rga tou\s lo/gous eu(ri/sketai.

sp.speaker: *klutaimnh/stra
sp.p:
a)ll' ou) ma\ th\n de/spoinan *)/artemin qra/sous

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
sp.p:
o(ra=|s; pro\s o)rgh\n e)kfe/rei, meqei=sa/ moi
le/gein a(\ xrh/|zoim', ou)d' e)pi/stasai klu/ein.

sp.speaker: *klutaimnh/stra
sp.p:
ou)/koun e)a/seis ou)d' u(p' eu)fh/mou boh=s
qu=sai/ m', e)peidh\ soi/ g' e)fh=ka pa=n le/gein;

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
sp.p:
e)w=, keleu/w, qu=e: mhd' e)paitiw=
tou)mo\n sto/m', w(s ou)k a)\n pe/ra le/caim' e)/ti.

sp.speaker: *klutaimnh/stra
sp.p:
e)/paire dh\ su\ qu/maq' h( parou=sa/ moi
pa/gkarp', a)/nakti tw=|d' o(/pws luthri/ous
eu)xa\s a)na/sxw deima/twn, a(\ nu=n e)/xw.
klu/ois a)\n h)/dh, *foi=be prostath/rie,
kekrumme/nhn mou ba/cin: ou) ga\r e)n fi/lois
o( mu=qos, ou)de\ pa=n a)naptu/cai pre/pei
pro\s fw=s parou/shs th=sde plhsi/as e)moi/,
mh\ su\n fqo/nw| te kai\ poluglw/ssw| boh=|
spei/rh| matai/an ba/cin ei)s pa=san po/lin.
a)ll' w(=d' a)/koue: th=|de ga\r ka)gw\ fra/sw.
a(\ ga\r prosei=don nukti\ th=|de fa/smata
dissw=n o)nei/rwn, tau=ta/ moi, *lu/kei' a)/nac,
ei) me\n pe/fhnen e)sqla/, do\s telesfo/ra,
ei) d' e)xqra/, toi=s e)xqroi=sin e)/mpalin me/qes:
kai\ mh/ me plou/tou tou= paro/ntos ei)/ tines
do/loisi bouleu/ousin e)kbalei=n, e)fh=|s,
a)ll' w(=de/ m' ai)ei\ zw=san a)blabei= bi/w|
do/mous *)atreidw=n skh=ptra/ t' a)mfe/pein ta/de,
fi/loisi/ te cunou=san oi(=s cu/neimi nu=n
eu)hmerou=san kai\ te/knwn o(/swn e)moi\
du/snoia mh\ pro/sestin h)\ lu/ph pikra/.
tau=t', w)= *lu/kei' *)/apollon, i(/lews klu/wn
do\s pa=sin h(mi=n w(/sper e)caitou/meqa.
ta\ d' a)/lla pa/nta kai\ siwpw/shs e)mou=
e)paciw= se dai/mon' o)/nt' e)ceide/nai:
tou\s e)k *dio\s ga\r ei)ko/s e)sti pa/nq' o(ra=n.

sp.speaker: *paidagwgo/s
sp.p:
ce/nai gunai=kes, pw=s a)\n ei)dei/hn safw=s
ei) tou= tura/nnou dw/mat' *ai)gi/sqou ta/de;

sp.p:

kei/nou; pre/pei ga\r w(s tu/rannos ei)sora=n.

sp.p:

h(dei=s fi/lou par' a)ndro\s *ai)gi/sqw| q' o(mou=.

sp.speaker: *klutaimnh/stra
sp.p:

sp.speaker: *paidagwgo/s
sp.p: *fanoteu\s o( *fwkeu/s, pra=gma porsu/nwn me/ga.

sp.speaker: *klutaimnh/stra
sp.p:

sp.speaker: *paidagwgo/s
sp.p: te/qnhk' *)ore/sths: e)n braxei= cunqei\s le/gw.

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
sp.p: oi)\ 'gw\ ta/lain', o)/lwla th=|d' e)n h(me/ra|.

sp.speaker: *klutaimnh/stra
sp.p: ti/ fh/s, ti/ fh/s, w)= cei=ne; mh\ tau/ths klu/e.

sp.speaker: *paidagwgo/s
sp.p: qano/nt' *)ore/sthn nu=n te kai\ pa/lai le/gw.

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
sp.p: a)pwlo/mhn du/sthnos, ou)de/n ei)m' e)/ti.

sp.speaker: *klutaimnh/stra
sp.p:
su\ me\n ta\ sauth=s pra=ss', e)moi\ de\ su/, ce/ne,
ta)lhqe\s ei)pe/, tw=| tro/pw| dio/llutai;

sp.speaker: *paidagwgo/s
sp.p:
ka)pempo/mhn pro\s tau=ta kai\ to\ pa=n fra/sw.
kei=nos ga\r e)lqw\n ei)s to\ kleino\n *(ella/dos
pro/sxhm' a)gw=nos *delfikw=n a)/qlwn xa/rin,
o(/t' h)/|sqet' a)ndro\s o)rqi/wn khrugma/twn
dro/mon prokhru/cantos, ou(= prw/th kri/sis,
ei)sh=lqe lampro/s, pa=si toi=s e)kei= se/bas:
dro/mou d' i)sw/sas ta)fe/sei ta\ te/rmata
ni/khs e)/xwn e)ch=lqe pa/ntimon ge/ras.
xw)/pws me\n e)n polloi=si pau=ra/ soi le/gw
ou)k oi)=da toiou=d' a)ndro\s e)/rga kai\ kra/th:
e(\n d' i)/sq': o(/swn ga\r ei)sekh/rucan brabh=s
dro/mwn diau/lwn pe/ntaql' a(\ nomi/zetai,
tou/twn e)negkw\n pa/nta ta)pini/kia
w)lbi/zet', *)argei=os me\n a)nakalou/menos,
o)/noma d' *)ore/sths, tou= to\ kleino\n *(ella/dos
*)agame/mnonos stra/teum' a)gei/ranto/s pote.
kai\ tau=ta me\n toiau=q': o(/tan de/ tis qew=n
bla/pth|, du/nait' a)\n ou)d' a)\n i)sxu/wn fugei=n.
kei=nos ga\r a)/llhs h(me/ras, o(/q' i(ppikw=n
h)=n h(li/ou te/llontos w)ku/pous a)gw/n,
ei)sh=lqe pollw=n a(rmathlatw=n me/ta.
ei(=s h)=n *)axaio/s, ei(=s a)po\ *spa/rths, du/o
*li/bues zugwtw=n a(rma/twn e)pista/tai:
ka)kei=nos e)n tou/toisi, *qessala\s e)/xwn
i(/ppous, o( pe/mptos: e(/ktos e)c *ai)twli/as
canqai=si pw/lois: e(/bdomos *ma/gnhs a)nh/r:
o( d' o)/gdoos leu/kippos, *ai)nia\n ge/nos:
e)/natos *)aqhnw=n tw=n qeodmh/twn a)/po:
*boiwto\s a)/llos, de/katon e)kplhrw=n o)/xon.
sta/ntes d' i(/n' au)tou\s oi( tetagme/noi brabh=s
klh/rois e)/phlan kai\ kate/sthsan di/frous,
xalkh=s u(pai\ sa/lpiggos h)=|can: oi( d' a(/ma
i(/ppois o(moklh/santes h(ni/as xeroi=n
e)/seisan: e)n de\ pa=s e)mestw/qh dro/mos
ktu/pou krothtw=n a(rma/twn: ko/nis d' a)/nw
forei=q': o(mou= de\ pa/ntes a)namemigme/noi
fei/donto ke/ntrwn ou)de/n, w(s u(perba/loi
xno/as tis au)tw=n kai\ frua/gmaq' i(ppika/.
o(mou= ga\r a)mfi\ nw=ta kai\ troxw=n ba/seis
h)/frizon, ei)se/ballon i(ppikai\ pnoai/.
kei=nos d' u(p' au)th\n e)sxa/thn sth/lhn e)/xwn
e)/xrimpt' a)ei\ su/rigga, decio\n d' a)nei\s
seirai=on i(/ppon ei)=rge to\n proskei/menon.
kai\ pri\n me\n o)rqoi\ pa/ntes e(/stasan di/froi:
e)/peita d' *ai)nia=nos a)ndro\s a)/stomoi
pw=loi bi/a| fe/rousin: e)k d' u(postrofh=s
telou=ntes e(/kton e(/bdomo/n t' h)/dh dro/mon
me/twpa sumpai/ousi *barkai/ois o)/xois:
ka)nteu=qen a)/llos a)/llon e)c e(no\s kakou=
e)/qraue ka)ne/pipte, pa=n d' e)pi/mplato
nauagi/wn *krisai=on i(ppikw=n pe/don.
gnou\s d' ou(c *)aqhnw=n deino\s h(niostro/fos
e)/cw paraspa=| ka)nakwxeu/ei parei\s
klu/dwn' e)/fippon e)n me/sw| kukw/menon.
h)/laune d' e)/sxatos me/n, u(ste/ras d' e)/xwn
pw/lous *)ore/sths, tw=| te/lei pi/stin fe/rwn:
o(/pws d' o(ra=| mo/non nin e)lleleimme/non,
o)cu\n di' w)/twn ke/ladon e)nsei/sas qoai=s
pw/lois diw/kei, ka)cisw/sante zuga\
h)laune/thn, to/t' a)/llos, a)/lloq' a(/teros
ka/ra proba/llwn i(ppikw=n o)xhma/twn.
kai\ tou\s me\n a)/llous pa/ntas a)sfalei=s dro/mous
w(rma=q' o( tlh/mwn o)rqo\s e)c o)rqw=n di/frwn:
e)/peita lu/wn h(ni/an a)ristera\n
ka/mptontos i(/ppou lanqa/nei sth/lhn a)/kran
pai/sas: e)/qrause d' a)/conos me/sas xno/as
ka)c a)ntu/gwn w)/lisqen: e)n d' e(li/ssetai
tmhtoi=s i(ma=si: tou= de\ pi/ptontos pe/dw|
pw=loi diespa/rhsan e)s me/son dro/mon.
strato\s d' o(/pws o(ra=| nin e)kpeptwko/ta
di/frwn, a)nwlo/luce to\n neani/an,
oi(=' e)/rga dra/sas oi(=a lagxa/nei kaka/,
forou/menos pro\s ou)=das, a)/llot' ou)ranw=|
ske/lh profai/nwn, e)/s te/ nin difrhla/tai,
mo/lis katasxeqo/ntes i(ppiko\n dro/mon,
e)/lusan ai(mathro/n, w(/ste mhde/na
gnw=nai fi/lwn i)do/nt' a)\n a)/qlion de/mas.
kai/ nin pura=| ke/antes eu)qu\s e)n braxei=
xalkw=| me/giston sw=ma deilai/as spodou=
fe/rousin a)/ndres *fwke/wn tetagme/noi,
o(/pws patrw/|as tu/mbon e)kla/xh| xqono/s.
toiau=ta/ soi tau=t' e)sti/n, w(s me\n e)n lo/gw|
a)lgeina/, toi=s d' i)dou=sin, oi(/per ei)/domen,
me/gista pa/ntwn w(=n o)/pwp' e)gw\ kakw=n.

prosh=lqes, o(/stis th=s e)mh=s yuxh=s gegw/s,

a)pecenou=to kai/ m', e)pei\ th=sde xqono\s
e)ch=lqen, ou)ke/t' ei)=den, e)gkalw=n de/ moi

nu=n d'h(me/ra| ga\r th=|d' a)ph/llagmai fo/bou

cu/noikos h)=n moi, tou)mo\n e)kpi/nous' a)ei\
yuxh=s a)/kraton ai(=manu=n d' e(/khla/ pou
tw=n th=sd' a)peilw=n ou(/nex' h(mereu/somen.

*klutaimnh/stra
sp.p: ou)/toi su/: kei=nos d' w(s e)/xei kalw=s e)/xei.

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra

sp.p:
a)=r' u(mi\n w(s a)lgou=sa kw)dunwme/nh
deinw=s dakru=sai ka)pikwku=sai dokei=
to\n ui(o\n h( du/sthnos w(=d' o)lwlo/ta;
a)ll' e)ggelw=sa frou=dos: w)= ta/lain' e)gw/.
*)ore/sta fi/ltaq', w(/s m' a)pw/lesas qanw/n.
a)pospa/sas ga\r th=s e)mh=s oi)/xei freno\s
ai(/ moi mo/nai parh=san e)lpi/dwn e)/ti,
se\ patro\s h(/cein zw=nta timwro/n pote
ka)mou= talai/nhs. nu=n de\ poi= me xrh\ molei=n;
mo/nh ga/r ei)mi, sou= t' a)pesterhme/nh
kai\ patro/s. h)/dh dei= me douleu/ein pa/lin
e)n toi=sin e)xqi/stoisin a)nqrw/pwn e)moi\
foneu=si patro/s. a)=ra/ moi kalw=s e)/xei;
a)ll' ou)/ ti mh\n e)/gwge tou= loipou= xro/nou
cu/noikos, ei)/seim', a)lla\ th=|de pro\s pu/lh|
parei=s' e)mauth\n a)/filos au)anw= bi/on.
pro\s tau=ta kaine/tw tis, ei) baru/netai,
tw=n e)/ndon o)/ntwn: w(s xa/ris me/n, h)\n kta/nh|,
